sense.def:
Kar je
unbelievable
, je izjemno dobro, veliko ali presenetljivo.

seg.quote: I went to her house in Henley: it was unbelievable.

sense.def:
Ideja ali teorija je
unbelievable
, kadar je tako nenavadna ali nesmiselna, da ji ne moremo verjeti.

seg.quote: There are many unbelievable aspects to this theory.
